statements: UPDATE basketball_game_tickets SET price = 50.00, total_tickets_sold = total_tickets_sold + 1 WHERE ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE basketball_game_tickets SET seat_number = 15, event_date = '2022-12-31', event_time = '18:00:00' WHERE ticket_id = 202;
UPDATE basketball_game_tickets SET price = 50.00, total_tickets_sold = total_tickets_sold + 5 WHERE ticket_id = 1000 AND event_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE basketball_game_tickets SET event_time = '18:30:00', seat_number = 25, total_tickets_sold = total_tickets_sold - 3 WHERE ticket_id = 2001 AND price = 75.00;
UPDATE basketball_games SET ticket_price = 75.00 WHERE venue_id = 101 AND game_date = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE seating_arrangements SET is_reserved = true, section = 'VIP' WHERE seat_id = 500 AND venue_id = 101;
UPDATE basketball_games SET ticket_price = 150.00 WHERE game_id = 101;
UPDATE seating_arrangements SET is_reserved = 'true' WHERE venue_id = 201 AND section = 'VIP';
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = 75.00 WHERE ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE seating_arrangements SET availability = false WHERE seat_id = 201;
UPDATE ticket_sales SET customer_name = 'John Doe', purchase_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE ticket_id = 101
UPDATE seating_arrangements SET availability = false, section_name = 'VIP' WHERE seat_id = 201

UPDATE seating_arrangements SET section = 'VIP' WHERE seating_id = 54321;
UPDATE ticket_sales SET price = 75.50 WHERE ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE basketball_games SET game_date = '2022-12-15', team1 = 'LA Lakers' WHERE game_id = 205;
